title: Drawing, "DragonOil (Green)", after 1980
medium: Green marker, brush and black ink over orange marker on white tracing paper
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Design for logo. The word DRAGONOIL in thick, san-serif block capital letters placed on blue rectangle in center of sheet. the word Dragon is formed by white paper support, outlined by green. The word Oil is black over orange. The green marker is applied to verso of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "DragonOil (Green)", after 1980.
after 1980. Green marker, brush and black ink over orange marker on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-380.
